course.title: Vector Space Methods for Differential Equations
course.description: Develops the theory of inner product spaces, both finite-dimensional and infinite-dimensional, and applies it to a variety of ordinary and partial differential equations. Topics: existence and uniqueness theorems, Sturm-Liouville systems, orthogonal polynomials, Fourier series, Fourier and Laplace transforms, eigenvalue problems, and solutions of Laplace's equation and the wave equation in the various coordinate systems.
course.prerequisites: Mathematics 23ab or 25 ab, or Mathematics 21ab plus any Mathematics course at the 100 level.
